issues.description: No value proposition exists - customers have zero understanding of what LaunchBase actually does or why they need it
issues.rationale: Without upstream brand data, there's no clear benefit statement or differentiation from competitors

issues.description: Pricing tiers completely undefined - small business owners can't evaluate cost vs value or choose appropriate plan
issues.rationale: Missing pricing structure prevents conversion decisions and creates trust issues

issues.description: No objection handling for control concerns - SMBs fear losing autonomy with SaaS tools but nothing addresses this
issues.rationale: Small businesses need reassurance about maintaining control over their processes

issues.description: Trust signals completely absent - no testimonials, logos, or proof points to validate LaunchBase credibility
issues.rationale: Small business owners need social proof before committing to new SaaS platforms

issues.description: Feature comparison matrix missing - can't differentiate between tier offerings or understand upgrade paths
issues.rationale: Clear feature differentiation drives tier selection and reduces decision paralysis

issues.description: No ROI messaging - small businesses need clear financial justification but value metrics are undefined
issues.rationale: SMBs evaluate tools based on concrete return on investment, not abstract benefits

issues.description: Onboarding complexity unaddressed - SMBs worry about implementation time but no messaging tackles this fear
issues.rationale: Quick setup promise critical for time-strapped small business owners

issues.description: Support availability unclear - small businesses need reassurance about help options but support terms missing
issues.rationale: 24/7 support vs business hours impacts SMB confidence in platform reliability

issues.description: No competitive positioning - LaunchBase exists in vacuum without clear differentiation from alternatives
issues.rationale: SMBs compare multiple solutions and need clear reasons to choose LaunchBase

issues.description: Money-back guarantee absent - reduces risk perception but no trial or refund policy communicated
issues.rationale: Risk reversal critical for converting hesitant small business buyers

suggestedFixes.fix: Lead with 'Launch your business online in 24 hours - no tech skills required' to clarify core value instantly
suggestedFixes.rationale: Combines speed benefit with skill objection handling for immediate clarity

suggestedFixes.fix: Create 3 clear tiers: Starter ($29), Growth ($79), Scale ($149) with monthly/annual toggle and savings badge
suggestedFixes.rationale: Price anchoring with clear progression path reduces decision friction

suggestedFixes.fix: Add 'You stay in control' section: export data anytime, no vendor lock-in, cancel instantly
suggestedFixes.rationale: Directly addresses autonomy fears that block SMB adoption

suggestedFixes.fix: Place 3 customer logos + revenue metrics above fold: '+47% revenue growth average'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Quantified success stories build immediate credibility

suggestedFixes.fix: Build feature matrix showing exclusive features per tier with 'Most Popular' badge on Growth
suggestedFixes.rationale: Visual comparison with social proof nudge accelerates tier selection

suggestedFixes.fix: Add ROI calculator: 'Save 10 hours/week = $2,000/month value' with industry benchmarks
suggestedFixes.rationale: Concrete time-to-money conversion justifies subscription cost

suggestedFixes.fix: Promise '15-minute setup' with progress bar visual and 'No IT team needed' badge
suggestedFixes.rationale: Specific time commitment with visual proof reduces implementation anxiety

suggestedFixes.fix: Display '24/7 chat support' badge with average 2-min response time metric
suggestedFixes.rationale: Always-available help with speed metric builds platform confidence

suggestedFixes.fix: Add comparison table: 'LaunchBase vs Others' highlighting unique all-in-one approach vs point solutions
suggestedFixes.rationale: Visual differentiation helps SMBs justify choosing LaunchBase

suggestedFixes.fix: Prominent '30-day money-back guarantee' seal with 'No questions asked' subtext near CTA
suggestedFixes.rationale: Risk reversal at decision point removes final purchase barrier
